response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly a game-changer and I believe it can significantly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the immense value it holds for you based on your needs. I'm confident that investing in this product will pay off in the long run. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 9500}
